original_title: Thomas Hylland Eriksen og historien om Origamijenta
overview: A director feels he is about to lose himself to the market forces and thinks that the only way he can protest is by making a political film. He contacts Thomas Hylland Eriksen, who will become his mouthpiece and articulate what is wrong. But along the way the director becomes distracted by another person, a young, fumbling girl reminiscent of himself.
title: The Professor and the Story of the Origami Girl
